title: Lingerie-clad Kylie Jenner displays her blooming baby bump in throwback snap
text:
She remained relatively guarded about her pregnancy journey ahead of the arrival of daughter Stormi Webster last year.

Yet Kylie Jenner was feeling wholly more candid on Friday as she took to Instagram to share an incredible snap from her pregnancy, in which she posed in white lingerie for a photo taken with an instant camera.

The reality star-turned-make-up mogul, 22, who split with 20-month-old Stormi's father Travis Scott earlier this year, posted a caption alongside the image in which she revealed her pregnancy made her 'stronger and more independent'.

Bumping along nicely: Kylie Jenner was feeling candid on Friday as she took to Instagram to share an incredible snap from her pregnancy

Kylie looked radiant in the snap in which she reclined while displaying her bump in all its glory - in a move which best showed off her changing shape.

In her caption, she penned: 'I have so many belly photos but this one has always been one of my favorites. baking my baby storm was such a special time in my life..

'I actually became so much stronger and independent throughout the entire experience. women really are amazing.. tag a strong woman in your life'.

She then tagged her mother Kris Jenner, who commented beneath the snap: 'I love you so much', while her sister Kourtney Kardashian tagged their sister Khloe.

Happy days: In her caption, she penned: 'I have so many belly photos but this one has always been one of my favorites. baking my baby storm was such a special time in my life'

The post comes after Kylie went viral when she shared a video in which she was waking Stormi up and sang: 'Rise and shine' - which led to her latest money-making plan has been slammed by social media.

The billionaire has filed multiple trademark applications for the phrase Rise and Shine, according to documents obtained by The Blast.

And after hearing the news incredulous fans have mocked the reality star for her copyright attempt of the well-used phrase.

Hilarious: Kylie tickled the internet after she was seen waking up daughter Stormi by singing Rise and Shine during a video tour of her Kylie Cosmetics office

Kylie tickled the internet after she was seen waking up daughter Stormi by singing Rise and Shine during a video tour of her Kylie Cosmetics office.

The application says that the phrase will be used on clothing and cosmetics while she also applied to copyright an alternative spelling of the phrase Riiise and Shiiine.

The internet is not impressed though, with one tweeter asking: 'Can I trademark Good Morning?'

Lost love: Kylie and Travis split earlier this year yet continue to spend time together

'How's Kylie Jenner trying to trademark the phrase "rise and shine" every mum and dad will end up owing her ps before midday,' tweeted another.

'how #Kylie going to trademark something my mother been saying to me since I was 3?' agreed another. 'Someone needs to stop them or soon they'll trademark Sun and Earth' pointed out another outraged tweeter.

Others mocked the make-up mogul's quest for more money. 'Kylie's trying to trademark the phrase rise and shine lmaoo the mind of a billionaire,' laughed one. 'Kris Jenner thinking of ways for Kylie to become a TRILLIONAIRE' mocked another.
description: The reality star-turned-make-up mogul, 22, who split with 20-month-old Stormi's father Travis Scott earlier this year, posted a caption in which she revealed her pregnancy made her 'stronger a
